1394CF37.Mod4_Description: {c_important}Caltrops{/c} now deals Cold damage and {c_important}{u}Chills{/u}{/c} enemies for {c_number}{SF_16}%{/c} per second.

74D6BC35.Mod2_Description: Enemies take {c_number}[{SF_14} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage from you each second they are in {c_important}Caltrops{/c}.

C435C5B6.Mod3_Description: You have {c_number}[{SF_18} * 100|%+|]{/c} Critical Strike Chance against enemies inside your {c_important}Caltrops{/c}. Double this amount against {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies.
